评论详情: I absolutely love this two-piece casual outfit! The fit is true to size, so there’s no need to guess or size up/down—it fits perfectly and looks flattering. The material is high-quality and well-made, with stitching and construction that feel durable and built to last.  What really stands out is how comfortable it is. The fabric is medium weight, making it ideal for lounging, running errands, or even casual outings. It’s stylish yet effortless, and can easily be dressed up or down.  If you’re looking for a comfortable, well-made, and machine washable set, this outfit is a fantastic choice. Highly recommend!

I bought a large and could have probably gotten away with a medium. But it’s comfortable and flowy. I added a chunk belt and it became stylish and something I could wear out. The color is great. It is soft and feels durable, but I just got it today.

评论概述: Love it but the color is....
评论详情: a very pale lavender, not even close to a deep purple which would have been great. I have this set in olive green & burgundy, very comfortable, loose but not overly so. Love the ribbed arms and especially the ribbed ankles, if you take a nap the legs never slide up. Soft, comfy, hand washable. Highly recommend.
I feel comfortable to put this on get my sneakers and go to the grocery store.  It is comfortable and appropriate

评论概述: Great color and cozy lightweight fabric
评论详情: Cute lounge outfit at good price. I’ve always loved brown, so I’m happy it’s back. This set is soft and comfy. It’s lightweight  The ribbed fabric reminds me of a Alo Muse copycat. It just really bothers me that the pant stripes are vertical and the top stripes are horizontal. Why aren’t they the same in a set?

This can be dressed up or dressed down. Super comfy, dressed it up with jewelry for a business casual look. I feel like it runs a little big but other than that I'd purchase it again.  Update: I purchased it in another color as well.

评论概述: Love it so much I bought it in three colors.
评论详情: It's perfect! I now have three sets. The fit is perfect, they launder beautifully – out of the dryer and out the door – and everyone who has seen them on me has remarked how flattering they are. I plan to buy two more, the pink and the denim blue. Maybe three more – I like that dark green. I bought an XL. It's plenty everything and not too much anything. You're going to love these!

I have a beautiful hourglass figure.  I liked the elevated style of a jogger-type outfit, something I could where to lounge in, look ok on camera in, maybe even go to the office in on a casual day.  The texture of this outfit along with the matching colors were very appealing. I ordered olive, but it is not a true olive.  Not quite forest green, maybe pine, but it does not feel like a fresh modern color to me.  The texture of the fabric felt a little like long- Johns and I think that is because the fabric is thin. I like that for comfort but it makes it a bit clingy.  Parts of the pants fit so well - the crotch and butt are perfect! The thighs and calves were not even throughout; in places tight, in places loose, so they didn’t hang exactly right.  The top looked in pre-view photos as if it would cover your hips and bottom, but it is not that long.  It is a nice cut and very comfortable.  I do wear this to lounge in, and it works ok for wearing on camera, lighting can be forgiving and there isn’t a focus on the bottom half. I wouldn’t feel very comfortable wearing this to the office…or the gym.
Very stretchy material I could have easily ordered a large instead of an extra large.
This outfit is exactly what I needed for those long travel days! Stretchy, soft, forgiving! And I appreciate the deep pockets! I just received a 2nd outfit in a different color for Xmas!

This is a great outfit to wear lounging around the house or running errands.  You can dress it up a little too.  It's sooooo comfortable.  I'm in love with the soft material.  I might have to get another color.

I went with the large. The top fits great. I feel the pants are a little big. I could’ve had a medium pant & probably would have fit better. Overall pleased with the outfit. I get tons of compliments every time I wear it.

评论概述: Not the same material as listed
评论详情: I have 3 of these outfits in different colors. They are my favorite thing to wear around the house. I keep different color options on my wish list so that my husband or mom know what to get me for presents. My husband got me the light green one for Christmas, but it wasn't the same material as my other ones. It is much lighter weight. Still comfy, but not as much as the others. The Product description lists 65% Polyester, 28% Viscose, 7% Elastane, but it only had Viscose and Elastane which made it much thinner. My other three (dark blue, dark gray, and pink) have 65% Polyester, 28% Viscose, 7% Elastane as listed in the product description.
Wearability, easy care.
I purchased the size Amazon said would fit but it was WAY too big. Super comfy though.
Love this for lounging! So soft and just the right size. I’m 5’4”, 155 and medium is great!
I’m definitely buying another set! This is lightweight, soft and comfortable. I can lounge in this all day. I did lounge in this all day! I love that the bottom has pockets.
It's see through very thin but nice material

评论概述: I love these sets. Comfortable to sleep in
评论详情: Cute fit! I’m 5’2” 130lbs and a SMALL fits perfectly. I bought 2 sets and I might buy 2 more.

评论概述: It was a gift to a hospice caregiver
评论详情: She loved it , she said it was warm and comfortable. The color is beautiful next to her skin and hair

This outfit is fantastic. It looks great and it feels wonderful on. The fit is true to size. The app will tell you the size up I did it and it looks terrific but I also could’ve worn my regular size and it would’ve probably fit just a little bit better but sizing up made it a Looser more laid-back look it is a beautiful outfit material workmanship truly a beautiful outfit.
This set is made of a different fabric than the other colors. Very thin and not corduroy like. Feels more like pajamas

I’m skeptical about ordering clothing online because you never know what you’re going to get! I was so excited to receive this as I just had abdominal surgery and wanted something comfy whenever I got home! It’s very stretchy, fits a bit loosely, and the material is very comfortable! I get hot easily as well and this set is NOT too warm for me! It’s the perfect comfort. Love that it has pockets! Even after surgery and being swollen I could still size down that’s how stretchy this set is! Definitely what I was looking for! Haven’t washed it yet but I think it’ll hold up well! I definitely plan to buy more colors! 🙂

评论概述: Comfy set to wear around the house
评论详情: This set is nice and comfy, soft fabric. It fits just as it says so if you want baggier tee you should size up.

评论概述: Quality material, heavier than it looks, butter soft. See Video!
评论详情: First purchase from this brand for my wife.  Looking for "lounge/casual" wear with cuffs and good quality.  The product is heavier than it appears in the add and i was pleasantly surprised at its weight when i opened it.  Stitching was well done, small rib/like striations in the fabric, cuffed pants.  The color is a "light blue to me" and it is buttery soft material.  I think she could also throw on some tennis shoes and run errands as well w/o feeling under dressed.  I would recommend this from my initial review.  Will update if the product has issues in the wash/etc.
I love these.  I have purchased 3 sets.  Can be worn out or used as pajamas.  Very versatile.  They launder up nicely.  Highly recommend!
Are there metal particles in the fabric? Inspected at the airport each time I wore this outfit. I was not wearing jewlery or anything else eith metal.
Product nice.
I just personally didn’t like the fit, but it’s very nice outfit
Great for chilly nights but still looks good. I will be ordering for my daughters and for myself in other colors. I’m getting rid of my old flannel sets!

I bought this outfit after seeing it on TikTok several times. While it is comfortable, it is not as soft as I would’ve liked the material to be. Also, I am 5’7” 180 pds. Typically wear an extra large. However, the extra large is baggy in the front in the pants so I would suggest sizing down. I had one concern when I first put this on. Concern was validated when my sister asked me “are you wearing your pajamas?“. I feel like this would look OK if layered with a cardigan or a vest. Otherwise it does kind of look like you’re wearing your pajamas.
So comfortable and breathable
I liked the fit material was just as I hoped . The price was great

I thought there would be more substance to the fabric. It’s pretty thin and would work for a southern fall night by the lake. I got it in black and it’s not see thru. It fit nice and the only complaint is it’s very high wasted unless you like your pants crotch halfway down your thigh. I’m keeping it because I’m about to have major back surgery and though this would work comfortably.

Ok if you have big hips, this is the outfit for you! I don’t have big hips and kind of swim in the bottoms but it is great to stay home in. I liked the color and the material is not too heavy for warm days.

Absolutely love this outfit ! My husband actually told me to go back and purchase another in a different color. I have 5’0” and weight 128 I purchased the small and it fits great. It’s super easy to jaz up too. Either some beautiful jewelry or even a nice scarf changes the whole look from simple to fancy. I would buy again and recommend it as well.
Returned to Amazon
Very comfortable, I am 5’8” and the pants are a little short. Kind of feels like I have pajamas on, but over all soft and comfortable. I am planning a trip and will wear this on the plane.

For the first time I actually ordered something (as in clothing) that actually fit PERFECT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I love it so much that I should have bought it in other colors but now the sale price is gone and it's back up to $42.....I hope it goes on sale.  I like things loose on me.....not sloppy baggy but loose and comfy, this is light weight material good for a warm day or even a cool day with a light jacket.  I am 5'5 and 150lbs (ouch) and I ordered an XL just based on people's reviews of the sizing.  XL IS PERFECT!
I love this lightweight lounge set. It isn't a thick fabric which makes it perfect for cool temps.
Loved this so much I bought 2 more in different colors! Great for travel and shopping, running errands or just to curl up in and be cozy!
I really loved these when I got them. They are super soft and comfortable.  After a few washes they started to pill on the in and outside. SO disappointing. Really wanted to love them.
Fabric is not comfortable next to skin for very long . Could not sleep in it . I like the design and color May send it back .

Honestly, I bought this set to wear on a transatlantic flight (which hopefully I’ll sleep on), but it looks like a pair of pajamas to me. I don’t feel cute in this outfit. I feel like I don’t want to be seen in my pajamas in the airport. Fit is true to size, it’s comfortable, color is accurate though. Just a heads up. I’m also curvier and short. I bought a large and it was loose but not overly baggy.
It’s kind of lightweight and super stretchy. It would stretch to fit two of me! The top seems to be about a size smaller than the bottoms and it feels awkward. The pants are super lose.
This is so comfy and more flattering than I expected. I’m 5’2” 140lb and got a small

I purchased this product in navy and wine/burgundy. The colors are lovely, material is soft, and comfortable fit. I purchased XL in both sets and very pleased with fit. I used the size chart to get the best fit.
The pants run really big the shirt was nice though
Fits great, so comfy!

评论概述: looks great, washes great looks great
评论详情: i liked the color and fit
Very comfortable and cute! Perfect for lounging.

I have several colors and love them overall..I wear them as loungewear/pj's. the black color shows lint  pretty badly, tho. I found myself dusting them off regularly and looking for my lint roller..not an issue with the other colors I purchased.
I love all of pretty gardens clothes! This outfit is great for running errands. The fit is spot on the color is beautiful. It’s lightweight soft and so comfortable. Buy it!

评论概述: Perfect fitting, washes beautifully, I love it!!
评论详情: Runs too large

I bought this for vacation and after washing it once, the seam on the side of the ‘collar’ unraveled and was hard to sew back together due to the wide stitching. The pants shrink a LOT washing in cool water and hanging to dry. It served its purpose and was nice while it lasted. You get what you pay for and I won’t be buying clothing like this from Amazon in the future.

I'm keeping this outfit, it's comfy... but I'm a curvy woman and it is not flattering on the curves, I even ordered the largest size so that it would have a looser fit on me, still an awkward fit in the mid-section and hips.  The top is great but the pants are sooooo not flattering!!  Very, very comfortable but I will not be wearing it in public any time soon, if ever.  The material is very weird; it is soft, but it is kind of slinky and not "sweatery".  It was hard to tell from the description how it would feel. It's not bad, just different, but not see-thru so that is good.  I will probably wear this around the house.  Not a bad product, just more for the smaller women (look at pictures in reviews...)

Purchased size L in white. Pants ran mostly true to size just slightly smaller, but still fits, the shirt is big and square, the only flattering part of this top were the sleeves. Not as soft as I had hoped it would be. Will not purchase another, but will keep the one I have to wear around house.

评论概述: Comfy, except for an itchy tag
评论详情: This set isn't something I'd normally wear to run errands or have lunch, but I really like it for days when I'm staying home because it's "dressed" enough to take my dog on a walk around the neighborhood without being embarrassed and comfy like pajamas. I like to tuck the shirt in and blouse it out to give a little more shape. My main complaint about these is that while they are soft and comfy, they've got a big, itchy tag inside. The tag is sewn into the seam, so I had to cut the seam open to remove the tag and then sew it back together. Just cutting the tag left a scratchy edge behind.  For reference, I'm 5'5 and 135 lbs (about a size 6) and the medium fit well. The top is very loose, but it fits how it looks in the picture, and the pants fit right. They're kind of on the thin side though, so get a darker color if you're concerned about the fabric showing your jiggly bits or panty lines.

this is better than I expected. I'm looking for something to wear on a transatlantic flight that will be comfortable and easy to wear on the airplane. This has a nice weight, not to hot or too cool and I like the sleeves on the top. very happy with this, will probably buy one in another color.

The material is like a really lite thin sweater, super comfy material .I am 5’4” and wear regular length AE jeans. The pants are high waisted , about 2” above belly button or at belly button saggy in rear and hangs between legs. Also, length at ankles are scrunched on me. This set in my opinion is great for lounging around the house. I like my stuff more fitted. This would be great for someone who is 5’7 plus or someone who likes a super high waisted pant. I’m keeping it for at home lounging and will roll the waist down.

Price point, especially for the quality of the material, is chef’s kiss!  This is the perfect airport outfit. It’s soft to the touch, not constricting, especially on long flights. It can be dressed up or down. The color looks great. I’ve washed it at least three or four times and the original color remains.

Just had a knee replacement and needed something loose and comfortable while recovering. Purchased three different sweatsuit type sets. All were a flop except this one, so I purchased another in a different color. I would have given 5 stars, but the shirt is a little too oversized and the off white is very see through.

评论概述: Regina George's mom from Mean Girls!
评论详情: This outfit was so incredibly comfortable! I wore for a Halloween dinner. I dressed as Regina George's mom from Mean Girls!

评论概述: I ordered a small and it runs large
评论详情: The shirt fits good but the plate too big
I love this,  it fits perfect
Absolutely loved it!  Going to buy more. Very comfortable .
I really love this outfit. It fits perfectly, and honestly is kind of slimming. Super comfy and soft.

评论概述: Perfect for days i just don’t care!!
评论详情: I’ve bought this in 3 colors. It’s comfortable, and looks somewhat put together as it’s a set, but It’s extremely unflattering, like awkward pajamas. The pants have pockets, and the top actually looks flattering with jeans, but as a set, I feel like I look like I just don’t care.  I appreciate the comfort, so I’ll gladly wear them!
One of my favorite purchases from Amazon. Loved the brown, so I bought two more colors.  I am 5'4", about 180lbs, 38-40D.
I lived in PJ sets like these postpartum. They were comfortable and still made me feel cute! True to size highly recommended.

I typically buy XL if I want things a little roomy, but contrast to what most reviewers posted, this XL fit a little snug.  The fabric wasn't scratchy, but wasn't super soft.  Middle of the road.  Stitching seems to be higher quality than Shein or Temu style products.  The color isn't a 'cool mocha' like it looks in the picture, it's more like an orangy medium brown.  Not quite the coffee color that's on trend right now.  I still love it enough to where I bought another set in a different color.
Very comfy for winter months, I used postpartum and loved the cute stay at home outfit as I was recovering
It looks like pajamas. I thought you would be able to wear it out.  It is kinda hot too. Size is correct.

I initially got a large, however the crotch hangs strangely and when I sezed down to a medium it looks fine. I love the arms and comfy fit while making you looks put together. Add a nice long coverup/jacket for the cold weather and it looks great. Since I had 2 sizes I would have loved the large top and medium bottom. That would have been perfect, however I still love the fit overall in the medium. I am getting a couple colors.  By the way there are pockets on the bottoms.
Great fit.

It’s much more light weight than I thought it would be. Definitely not a bad thing when in Texas. I like the fit of the pants. The shirt fits a little wonky. I’m 5’9”, 190#, 38DD, wear a large in everything. Color is on point. Haven’t washed and dried so we will see how it is after that. Keeping it.
I bought this to travel in. Leaving for Paris in a few days and this outfit is perfect. Very comfy, great fit and good quality. I’m 5 feet and curvey
Nice lounging set for lazy days at home. Have not washed yet but will hang to dry. Love the color.

I was afraid to try it on but to my surprise the top and bottom fit perfectly!  Beautiful shade of purple and very nice material.  I ordered the extra large and thankfully it was the right size as I am 5’7 and 182 lbs.  It’s great to wear out or lounging in.  I’ll be ordering other colors!  Great buy, don’t hesitate to purchase.
I love this outfit!!  I’m looking for other other colors to purchase

评论概述: Love the fit nice and loose but comfortable.
评论详情: Love the fit, the style and the color. I have washed it and it comes out great. Look wearing this in the garden 😃

I thought this would be a more athletic fit, and more comfortable. The fabric feels really thin and cheap and is kind of like a waffle weave texture, but not in a cute way. The style makes it look like something Blanche on the golden girls would wear with high heels.

评论概述: I love, love, love, love these!!
评论详情: Have I said how much I love these?  I own three- black white and gray. They are so super cute and they look fantastic on.  Are they on the thin side?  Yes, but that is exactly what I wanted.  Think of the material that long johns are made from, and that is how they feel...they keep you cozy, but not overly hot or thick, which, as a menopausal woman, I totally appreciate!  And OMG, they look fabulous!  I can throw these on to run errands, put a cute pair of Tory Burch sneakers on, and a great pair of earrings, and people think I worked hard on my outfit!  I especially love the white pair for looking so cute but being so comfy.  I would suggest sizing down from what the chart says unless you like things very loose.  I didn't want that.  I wanted them to give me a little bit of shape and sexiness.  You will adore these if you know wha† to expect, which is that the fabric is thinner, but still excellent!

I’m 5’8” 160 lbs.  I ordered medium.  Fit was great but the pant length was too short.  Looked too short vs styled short if that makes sense.  I got it in khaki and really don’t like the color in person.
Comfy and cozy!.  Love it!

评论概述: Love it but be careful color bleeds in washing
评论详情: I love the outfit. Super comfy. It was not tight but more fitting when I first put it on and it does stretch out quite a bit  very quickly. Doesn’t lose its shape just gets looser when wearing so size down. Also it bleeds. I got the grey and some of the items that were like colors but had light collars that had been washed before with no issues came out very dingy. I will probably buy another color but will wash with vinegar alone first.

I think this is a really cute matching set. The fabric is nice. It’s soft and not too thick but also not too thin that’s it’s see through either. And the fit is pretty good as well. I went with an XL because Amazon suggested I needed XXL and I thought that seemed a little off. But the XL was too big on me as well, and I am returning to exchange for a large hopefully that will fit me better and I’ll know for sure if I am in love or not.

This outfit is really cute on, more so than I expected. I read reviews when trying to decide what size to get (I am 5’2 and about 138lbs) I chose to go with a medium but could have gotten a small. It is still very flattering, it has a wider neckline so isn’t quite off the shoulder but will show a bra strap, which I don’t mind. I went with the color Red Wine and it is true to color shown. I plan one buying another if I can decide on which color since there are so many I like !! But I’m going to go with a small next time :)

I bought this at 33 weeks pregnant for post partum! It fits great! Still stretchy/loose fitting, and very comfortable! Wish the fabric was just a little softer, but the color and fit is great! I'd order this in another color for sure!
Too relaxed for going anywhere,  not very soft, material thin. Color is true to picture.  I really wanted something more soft & warm.
Very comfortable to wear and washes and dries so well!!
It has pockets and is super comfy. It’s great for fall weather as it’s not heavy/thick. I will be ordering it in various colors.

评论概述: Could be cute but it's a little odd styling.
评论详情: The fabric is thin and wrinkles easily. It could be cute it feels nice but the top is a very odd fit of some others have mentioned. It should be more fabric and drape off the shoulder but it does not. I end Just wearing it around the house.

I bought this because the description inseam measurement would have fit me. I wouldn’t have a ton of pooling at my ankle, but it should have been long enough. Nope, not even close. I am only 5’8 and barely have a 31 inch inseam. You can see by the photo that they are no where near long enough. With that said, the material was sort of “pajama” feeling and I was not a fan of it so I likely would have returned anyways. I felt it ran small. I ordered an L according to the sellers chart and I would have needed an xl to be comfortable in it. However, on the L, the sleeves were plenty long. There is not a front or back to the pants, no tag, no markings, no differentiation I tried them on both ways and they fit the same.

When I bought this I was expecting that soft fleece type of material, or the velour corduroy type but it was neither. Doesn't hang right for an X-large. looks nothing like it does on the models and just looks plain frumpy.  I sure wish AMAZON would stop doping business with these cheap manufacturers. Im getting so sick of buying cheap clothes, that you could get at.
Loved this but it was too small.
Love this outfit.  Fits true to size, fabric is comfortable and length is perfect.  Loved this product bought another one.  Great colors

评论概述: Very cute, but not true plus sized
评论详情: Very cute outfit, but the even the largest size did not fit like the picture. I didn’t have trouble getting the items on, but the fit was too small for my liking.  I was hoping to have the top be more baggy like the picture, so I ordered the largest size, but it fit too close to the body on me. I am 5’6, 230lbs, size 16-18 in plus size clothing, and a 38H bust.

I tried this on, unfortunately after the return window passed, but I was sent a M instead of XL so off course it didn't fit. The cut is weird and the fabric is scratchy. I definitely will not repurchase in the correct size.

I was really hoping for a cute, comfortable, errand, lounging outfit. Maybe an outfit you could wear to the office on the weekend if you had to go in. These are not those. If you want a lounging at home outfit a small step up from pajamas, these are for you.
